summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 18, D. S. Maynard's Addition, being the alley between 3rd Avenue South and 4th Avenue South, from Washington Street to Main Street; by constructing or reconstructing a timber trestle and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14858 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
